title: Health Insurance

en: Now that you have someone to back you up, you realize quitting your full-time job is real, achievable, and right around the corner. But with the joy of that realization comes an unpleasant reality: you'll soon be out of health insurance. The anxiety sits in the back of your mind, tugging at you. Is it worth doing some research to see what your options are?

no_caption: Put it out of your mind

en: You spend the day on various websites. It's good that you looked, because there was a limited amount of time between when you quit a job and when you can apply for assisted health insurance coverage. Now you know that's something you need to do ASAP when the time comes.
You ignore the impulse. You can deal with that when the time comes, and you've got too much on your plate to handle it now!
